list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add home view with login required
Updated the Django project to include a home view that requires login. Modified URL routing, templates, and authentication flow to support the new view. Introduced new templates for signup and password change functionalities, and added custom password validation.

task.summary:
Add initial IntelliJ IDEA project configuration files
Integrated essential IntelliJ IDEA project files for setup, including module, workspace, VCS, and other configuration settings. This configuration ensures proper module structure and version control settings specific to the photoblog project.

Initialize Django project and add initial config files
Set up the basic structure for the "photoblog" Django project. Added `.gitignore`, `manage.py`, `requirements.txt`, and initial Django project and app files including settings, URLs, and WSGI/ASGI configurations.

Initialize Django project with custom user model and authentication.
Set up the basic structure for the "photoblog" project, including a custom user model, login/logout views, templates, and forms. Integrated initial configurations and dependencies for the project.

Add home view with login required
Updated the Django project to include a home view that requires login. Modified the URL routing and templates to support the new view. Adjusted authentication flow to redirect to the home view upon successful login.

Add home view with login required
Updated the Django project to include a home view that requires login. Modified URL routing, templates, and authentication flow to support the new view. Introduced new templates for signup and password change functionalities, and added custom password validation.
